tool.name: tool_28

param.name: AREA
param.dialogReference:
Catchment Area

Grid, input

The catchment area grid [map unitsz^2].

param.name: CIT
param.dialogReference:
CIT Index

Grid, output

The Channel Initiation Threshold index.

param.name: CONV
param.dialogReference:
Area Conversion

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] no conversion (areas already given as specific catchment area)

[1] 1 / cell size (pseudo specific catchment area)

Default: 0

tool.summary: The tool allows one to calculate a variant of the Stream Power Index, which was introduced to detect channel heads (channel initiation) based on a drainage area-slope threshold. The Channel Initiation Threshold (CIT) index is calculated as: CIT = SCA * tan(Slope)^2
